meanings.definition: A short, high-pitched sound or tone.
meanings.sent1: The beep of the alarm clock woke me up.
meanings.sent2: I heard a beep coming from the microwave.
meanings.sent3: The beep of the car horn made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The beep of the heart monitor was a constant reminder of life.
meanings.sent5: The beep of the oven timer filled the kitchen with anticipation.

meanings.definition: To make a short, high-pitched sound or tone.
meanings.sent1: I will beep the car horn to get their attention.
meanings.sent2: The microwave will beep when the food is ready.
meanings.sent3: The robot beeped happily after completing its task.
meanings.sent4: The watch beeped, reminding me of the passing time.
meanings.sent5: The phone beeped with each new message, keeping me informed.
